keyMoments.title: Doru Doru no Mi First Demonstration
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3 demonstrates his Wax-Wax Fruit powers by creating a white wax house structure on Kyuka Island, showcasing his ability to create and manipulate wax.
keyMoments.significance: First display of the Doru Doru no Mi's abilities in the series, establishing Mr. 3's unique Devil Fruit power.

abilities.description: The user can produce and manipulate wax from their body, creating structures, weapons, and other objects.
The user can construct buildings and complex structures made entirely of wax, as demonstrated with the wax house.

weaknesses.description: User cannot swim and is weakened by seawater and Seastone.

reveals.information: Mr. 3 (Galdino) is the current user of the Doru Doru no Mi
The fruit allows creation and manipulation of wax for various purposes
Wax can be used to construct large structures like buildings
